Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.1 Sappaccayaduka » 2.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaccayaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
13.
568Sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
569Appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
